about.title: About
about.name: Blue Rocket Fuel
about.text: An Open Source app starter kit for typical applications that require user login, registration and data interaction with a back-end web service.

format.title: Invalid Email
format.body: The format of the email addres you entered does not appear to be correct.

missing.title: Specify a Password
missing.body: Please enter a password you would like to use.

confirm.title: Confirm Password
confirm.body: Please re-type your password to confirm.

match.title: Password Confirmation
match.body: The confirmation password you entered does not match. Please re-enter both.

invalid.title: Username Taken
invalid.body: A user with that email has already been registered.

username.title: Username Required
username.body: Please enter the username you used when you registered.

password.title: Missing Password
password.body: Please enter the password you selected when you registered.

invalid.title: Invalid Login
invalid.body: Please check your email and password and try again.

unkown.title: We’re sorry. An unknown server problem has occurred.

connection.title: No Internet Connection
connection.message: It looks like you may have lost Internet connection. Please check your settings and try again.

timeout.title: Slow Internet Connection
timeout.message: It looks like you may be experiencing a slow Internet connection. Please try again later.
